section.note: The SDK calculates the sampling interval using the samplesPerCall, sampleRate, and channel parameters in , and triggers the , , , and callbacks based on the sampling interval. Sampling interval (seconds) = samplesPerCall / (sampleRate × channel). Make sure the sampling interval is ≥ 0.01 seconds.

Usage mode of the audio data. Can be set to:
RAW_AUDIO_FRAME_OP_MODE_READ_ONLY (0): Read-only mode, for example, when the user pushes the data stream using the Agora SDK.
RAW_AUDIO_FRAME_OP_MODE_READ_WRITE (2): Read-write mode, for example, when the user applies custom audio effects or preprocessing such as voice changing.
Number of samples per callback, e.g., set to 1024 for media pushing.
